verses.content: Chu ni chun, kohran Jerusalema umhai chu miin nasatakin an suknawmna phut tah a; chuongchun, tirkohai bak naw chu Judai le Samari ram khaw tinah an indar ta vawng a.
Chun, Pathien ngaisak tuhaiin amanih Stephan chu an phûm a, nasatakin an ṭap a.
Saula ruok chun kohranhai chu a suknawmna bêk bêk a, in tinah a lût a, a nuhmei a pasalin a hnûk dawk a, intângna inah a khum hlak.
Chun, ân darhai chu khaw tinah an feh a, thu chu an hril pei a.
Chun, Philip chu Samari khuoah a zu feh a, an kuomah Krista thu a khêk pui a.
Mipuihaiin a thu an hriet a, a thilmak thawhai an hmu chun Philip thu hril chu lungril hmunkhatin an ngaisak a,
khawhri inthiengnawhai chu mi tamtak an imanhai sûnga inthawkin rawl inringtaka khêka an suok leiin le, zeng le keinbai tamtak khawm an hung dam ta leiin.
Chun, chu khuoa chun nasatakin an lâwm tah a.
Chun, a hming Simon, mi pakhat a um a; ama chun, chu khuoa chun dawi hmangin Samari khuoa mihai maktitakin a lo siem ta hlak a.
Mi po po chun mi setaka inthawka ân laltak chenin, “Hi mipa hi Pathien thilthawtheina, ‘Ropui,’ an ti kha a ni hi,” tiin a thu an ngaisak tâwl hlak.
A dâwi hmangin sâwttak mak titaka a siem hlak leiin a thu an ngaisak a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun Pathien ram chanchin ṭha le Isu Krista hming Chanchin Ṭha Philip hril chu an âwi phingleh, a nuhmei a pasalin baptisma an chang tah a.
Chun, Simon rau khawmin a âwi ve tah a, chun baptisma a chang zo chun, Philip kuomah a um zing a. Inchikna le thilmak nasatak thawa umhai chu a hmu veh a, mak a ti hle hlak a.
Chun, tirko Jerusalema umhai khan Samari khuoa mihaiin Pathien thu an awi ti an hrietin, an kuomah Peter le Johan chu an tir a.
Anni chu an zuk tlung chun Thlarau Inthieng an hmu theina dingin an ṭawngṭaipêk a.
Chu hma chun anni laia tu chunga khawm a la tlung nawh; Lal Isu hmingin baptisma an chang chau a la nih.
Chun, an chungah an kut an innghat a, Thlarau Inthieng an hmu tah a.
Chun, tirkohai kut innghat leia Thlarau Inthieng pêk a nih ti Simonin a hmuh a,
“Hi thuneina hi mi pe ve ro, tû chunga khawm kut kân nghatna taphawtin Thlarau Inthieng an hmu vena dingin,” tiin an kuomah tangka pêk a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin a kuomah, “I tangka hi nanga ruolin bohmang raw se, Pathien thilpêk tangka suma inchâwk i tum leiin.
Hieng thua hin i ṭhang ve nawh, chan khawm i nei bawk nawh; i lungril Pathien ngaiin a fel nawh.
Chuleiin, i suol hi sim la, Lalpa kuomah ṭawngṭai rawh, chuongchun, i lungrila i ngaituo hi a ngaidam che rawi mawh.
Thil khâkna mîta le, suol khuop thlûkna hmunah i um ti ka hriet a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Simonin, “In thil hril hi ka chunga iengkhawm a tlung nawna dingin nangnîn Lalpa kuomah mi ṭawngṭaipêk ro,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuongchun, anni chun Lalpa thu chu an inhriettira an hril zoin, Jerusalemah an fe nâwk tah a; Samari rama mihai khaw tamtak kuomah Chanchin Ṭha chu an hril pei a.
Chun, Lalpa vântirko pakhatin Philip chu a biek a, “Tho la, sim tienga Jerusalema inthawka Gaza zuk sun lampuia khan fe rawh, chu lampui chu thlalêra fe thleng a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a tho a, a fe tah a. Chun, ngai ta, Ethiopia rama mi pakhat, Ethiopia lalnu Kandaki hnuoia mitillâk inlaltak, a ro po po enkawltu, Jerusalemah Pathien be dingin a hang feh a.
A hung tieng chun a tawlailîra ṭhung pumin zâwlnei Isai lekhabu a tiem pei a.
Chun, Thlarau chun Philip kuomah, “Saw tawlailîr saw va hnai la, va pâwl rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Philip chu mitillâk kuoma chun a va tlân a, zâwlnei Isai lekhabu a tiem a hriet a, “I tiem kha a umzie i hriet am?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Tukhawmin an mi hrilfie naw chun, iengtin am hre thei ka ta?” a ta. Chun, a kuoma hung ṭhung dingin Philip chu a fiel tah a.
Pathien Lekha a tiem lai chu hi hi a nih:- “That dingin berâm angin ama chu an ṭhuoi a; Berâmtê a hmul vâwtu hmaa a to zing angin, Ama khawmin a bau a ka nawh;
A tlâwm laiin a rorêlna chu lâkpêkin a um a; A thlahai chanchin tuin am hril tâng an ta? Khawvêla inthawkin a hringna an lâkpêk ta sih a,” ti hi.
Chun, mitillâk chun Philip a biek a, a kuomah, “Zâwlneiin hieng thu hi tû thu am a na a hril, ama thu am a ni, mi dang thu? kân dawn che,” a ta.
Philip chun a hril a, chu Pathien Lekha Thu chu a bulah a phut a, a kuomah Isu thu a hril a.
Chun, lampuia an fe malamin tui ieng amanih an tlung a; chun, mitillâk chun, “En ta, hitaka hi tui a um, baptisma changna ding iengin am a mi hluo kher leh?” a ta.
[Chun, Philip chun, “I lungril po poa i ring chun, i chang thei,” a ta. Ama chun, “Isu Krista chu Pathien Naupa a ni ka ring,” a ta, a dawn a].
Chun, tawlailîr chu ân ngîrtir a, an pahni chun, Philip le mitillâk chu tuia chun an zu feh a; chun, Philip chun ama chu a baptis tah a.
Tuia inthawk chu an hang suok phingleh, Lalpa Thlarau chun Philip chu a lâk hmang tah a; mitillâk chun ama chu a hmu nâwk ta nawh a, nisienlakhawm, hlimtakin a fe ta pei a.
Philip chu miin Azota khuoah an hmu nâwk tah a; chun, a fe thleng a, Kaisari khuo a tlung hmakhat chun, khaw tinah Chanchin Ṭha chu a hril pei a.
